name: business_day_calculation
bug_description: Weekends not excluded from business days - code adds calendar days instead of business days, so weekends and holidays are incorrectly counted
correct_implementation: while (remainingDays > 0) { currentDate = currentDate.plusDays(1); if (currentDate.dayOfWeek != DayOfWeek.SATURDAY && currentDate.dayOfWeek != DayOfWeek.SUNDAY) remainingDays-- }
